name: MIX:BAR Vanilla Bourbon Body Mist Spray, Hair Mist Perfume + Linen Spray for Women + Girls - Fragrance Notes of Vanilla Bean, Sandalwood, Jasmine + Bergamot - Vegan + Cruelty Free - 5oz.
short_description: MIX:BAR Vanilla Bourbon hair & body mist spray is a warm vanilla cloud spiked with a hint of mellow, oak-infused bourbon—and interwoven with layers of golden amber, apple blossom, and black pepper—for a nostalgic scent that is both comforting and invigorating
Inspired by the richness of pure vanilla beans. Notes of: Bergamot, Jasmine, Apple Blossom, Madagascar Vanilla Bean, Sandalwood.

Hair & Body Mist provides a subtle, all over scent you spray from head to toe, and even on your linens and in your bedroom. Thoughtfully designed to be worn alone or mixed + layered. Try layering with MIX:BAR Whipped Almond EDP or body mist
100% clean + luxe formula free from parabens, phthalates. Vegan + cruelty free.

For a more fun and fragrant experience, personalize and enhance your Vanilla Bourbon Hair & Body Mist by first spraying MIX:BAR EDP as a base layer to pulse points to help your scent last. Next, spritz the Hair & Body spray all over your hair and body to refresh and deepen the scent, then take the Brush-On Fragrance Pen for on-the-go adventures. You may also layer and blend with other MIX:BAR fragrances to create your own signature scent!
product_description: MIX:BAR gives you a new way to express yourself through fragrance, with scents for every mood, attitude or occasion, all crafted by the finest perfumers. Thoughtfully designed fragrances can be worn alone, but become even more beautiful when mixed and layered together—allowing you endless possibilities to create a new scent that's uniquely you. Become the creator of your own signature fragrance with MIX:BAR. Pure and personalized fragrances for you, by you. Luxury for All.

name: Bath & Body Works Warm Vanilla Sugar Fine Fragrance Mist, Body Spray & Perfume for Women, Long-Lasting Personal Fragrance, Sparkling Sugar and Sweet Vanilla Scent, 8 fl oz - 1 Pack
short_description: FINE FRAGRANCE MIST FOR BODY & HAIR: With a lightweight, refreshing scent, this Bath & Body Works body spray is designed to leave a lasting impression without feeling heavy, making it ideal for everyday wear.

A COZY VANILLA FRAGRANCE WITH GENTLE SWEETNESS: This Bath & Body Works fragrance spray combines intoxicating vanilla, white orchid, sparkling sugar, fresh jasmine, and creamy sandalwood for a comforting scent that feels familiar, smooth, and inviting.
LIGHTWEIGHT PERSONAL FRAGRANCE FOR EVERYDAY USE: Designed for everyday use, this lightweight personal fragrance for women is highly wearable without overpowering.

FINE MIST SPRAY DESIGNED FOR EVEN COVERAGE: The fine mist perfume spray applies evenly for smooth coverage across skin and hair. Designed to help distribute the fragrance consistently without heavy spots or buildup. Bottle is made with 50% recycled plastic.
DERMATOLOGIST APPROVED: Based on review of independent testing by board-certified dermatologist. Made without parabens or phthalates. Not tested on animals and vegan.
product_description: Launched by the design house of Bath and Body Works. This oriental vanilla fragrance has a blend of vanilla, lily, coconut, rice, sandalwood, musk, and heliotrope.

name: Le Monde Gourmand Crème Vanille Body Oil
short_description: We’ve taken our beloved Crème Vanille scent and transformed it into an ultra rich body oil that transforms skin from parched to parfait. Quick to absorb, Apricot and Sweet Almond Oils nourish skin, while vegetable derived vitamin E and antioxidants help retain the appearance of pampered skin. This can be used as a nourishing bath oil, a gentle body cleanser in the shower or massaged into the skin for maximum hydration and glow.
Layer with Crème Vanille La Moussse and Crème Vanille Eau de Parfum
Dispense 1-2 pumps into palm. Massage in to wet or dry skin or apply wherever glowy moisture is desired. If you like, apply Eau de Parfum or Hair & Body Mist to layer scent for all-day wear.

Collect Them All: Expertly blended, addictively indulgent scents that pair perfectly with you. Try the Le Monde Gourmand collection to build your fragrance wardrobe with core scents including Eau de Parfum, Hair & Body Mist, Perfume Oil, Fresh Mist, Body Oil, and Body Mousse.
A Fragrance You Can Feel Good About: This product is Vegan and Cruelty Free with no Parabens, Pthalates or Sulfates.

This mini alcohol-free body mist features a warm, creamy vanilla bean scent with notes of warm sandalwood and coconut cream that lingers. Perfect for daily use, this mist adds a joyful touch to your winter self-care routine. Spritz it on throughout the day for a revitalizing burst of fragrance or layer with other Tree Hut products to create a custom scent experience.
